author: tersec
content:
generally prefer this to the more discrete version, since this comparison factor seems like something that would come up at some point anyway.

having the special max value essentially is a special case, really, which there's no way is going to be actually computed in any meaningful sense. presumably implementations will just detect some variation of `$very_large_number` and treat it specially (whether by saturating arithmetic, etc).
